item_description: An Italian coffee drink that is prepared with equal parts double espresso, steamed milk, and steamed milk foam on top.
A coffee drink made with 1/3 espresso and 2/3 steamed milk.
An espresso-based drink that contains steamed milk.
A double-shot of espresso and hot water.
A plain biscuit with wheat flour.
A biscuit made with wheat flour, jam, coconut shreds, and chocolate chip.
